name: Thai Fonts for Elementor
author: CoombCo

sections.description:
Do not limit yourself to Google’s Thai fonts bunded in Elementor. Compatible with Elementor FREE & PRO, you now have access to various Thai fonts available
from the Elementor Editor. List of included Thai fonts:

* Noto Sans Thai
* Noto Serif Thai
* Moonjelly
* IBM Plex Thai
* CS Prajad
* CS Chatthai UI
* Cloud
* Boon
* Anuphan
* Anakotmai
* Silpakorn
* RSU

Fonts Authors Credit: Typomancer, Cadson Demak, CS@Nok, Fontuni, Silpakorn University, Rangsit University
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins in the Admin menu
  2. Click on the button Add new
  3. Search for Thai Fonts for Elementor and click ‘Install Now’ or click on the upload link to upload thai-fonts-for-elementor.zip
  4. Click on Activate plugin
sections.faq:
Does this plugin works with other Editors?

This plugin only support Elementor Website Builder

Can I upload my own font through this plugin?

No you can’t
sections.changelog:
1.0.0: January 28, 2021

  • Birthday of Thai Fonts for Elementor

1.0.1: February 4, 2021

  • Added RSU Font
  • Fix CS PraJad not rendering
  • Fix CS ChatThaiUI not rendering
  • Remove unnessesary files

short_description: A simple plugin that dynamically enqueue selected Thai language fonts, and make them available in the Elementor\'s Editor

upgrade_notice: No prior updates required, this is the very first release
